name: FPS CHAOS
description:
Hello everyone, Im Arjun - 10 yrs old from India. This is my first brackeys game jam participation. I have developed this with over 15 hrs of development over a period of 2 days. The theme is , You play in space and all the enemies will try to kill you! But if you shoot wrong, a new enemy will spawn! And if you kill the enemies they will give you weapons and powerups!

Please play and share your feedback. This is my first 3d game attempt as well.
